statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE building_id = 1
SELECT building_id, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY building_id
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY date LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT building_id FROM energy_consumption
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE building_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC, energy_usage ASC;
SELECT building_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY building_id;
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS average_usage, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') AS month_year FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m');
SELECT building_id, MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage, MIN(energy_usage) AS min_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY building_id;
SELECT building_id, date, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY building_id ASC, energy_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT building_id, date, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_id, date, time, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT building_id, date, time, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE building_id = 2 AND date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT building_id, energy_consumed, date FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY date ASC, time DESC;
SELECT building_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY building_id;
SELECT building_name, address FROM building_info WHERE construction_year > 1990 ORDER BY building_name;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed, MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT E.building_id, B.building_name, E.energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data E JOIN building_info B ON E.building_id = B.building_id WHERE E.date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT building_id, date, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT building_name, location FROM BuildingInformation WHERE area_sqft > 5000;
SELECT building_name, location, optimization_date, optimization_details FROM BuildingInformation JOIN EnergyOptimization ON BuildingInformation.building_id = EnergyOptimization.building_id;
SELECT * FROM BuildingInformation WHERE building_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT building_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY building_id;
SELECT building_id, date, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed > 100 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM BuildingInformation JOIN EnergyConsumptionData ON BuildingInformation.building_id = EnergyConsumptionData.building_id WHERE area_sqft > 5000;
SELECT building_name, location, optimization_date FROM BuildingInformation JOIN EnergyOptimization ON BuildingInformation.building_id = EnergyOptimization.building_id ORDER BY optimization_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT building_id, timestamp, electricity_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_name, location FROM BuildingInformation WHERE building_type = 'Office';
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY reading DESC;
SELECT building_id, optimization_timestamp, energy_saved, water_saved FROM OptimizationResults WHERE energy_saved > 1000;
SELECT building_name, location, building_type FROM BuildingInformation
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT SUM(electricity_consumed) AS total_electricity_consumed, SUM(water_consumed) AS total_water_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT building_name, SUM(energy_saved) AS total_energy_saved FROM BuildingInformation BI JOIN OptimizationResults OR ON BI.building_id = OR.building_id GROUP BY building_name ORDER BY total_energy_saved DESC

SELECT building_name, sensor_type, MAX(reading) AS max_reading FROM BuildingInformation BI JOIN SensorData SD ON BI.building_id = SD.building_id GROUP BY building_name, sensor_type ORDER BY max_reading DESC
SELECT * FROM building_info;
SELECT building_name, location FROM building_info WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM meter_data WHERE consumption > 100;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT building_name, source_name FROM building_info INNER JOIN building_energy_sources ON building_info.building_id = building_energy_sources.building_id WHERE building_info.location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM building_info;
SELECT building_id, building_name, location FROM building_info WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_id, date, consumption FROM meter_data WHERE consumption > 100 AND date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY consumption DESC;
SELECT b.building_name, s.source_name FROM building_energy_sources bes JOIN building_info b ON bes.building_id = b.building_id JOIN energy_sources s ON bes.source_id = s.source_id;
SELECT w.date, w.temperature, w.humidity FROM weather_data w WHERE temperature < 20 OR humidity < 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
